div.p: NARRATOR: In addition, because we have integrated alcohol or drugs into so many aspects of our lives, we have many more opportunities to develop state-dependent learning. (group plays pool)
(more and more glasses are put on the bar) NARRATOR: As my use broadens and my tolerance increases, state-dependent learning occurs in more skill areas.
NARRATOR: I become increasingly dependent on high-risk choices to feel competent and confident. Let's look at the pattern that develops...
